title: Hold Me Close
description: Rachel wants one thing in life, a family of her own. But she's not going to get it without a man. Or can she?They may have ruined their chances in the past, but Matt and Trevor know Rachel's the woman for them. When they discover her plans, they tell her they'll give her exactly what she wants ... the old-fashioned way. Because once they get their hands on her, they'll hold her close and never let go.
author: Vanessa Vale
